title: [1.8][ssp/smp]Creeper Awareness Mod苦力怕意识mod!
author: 740s
txt_content:
本帖最后由 740s 于 2015-5-22 22:45 编辑 

{:10_512:}今天我又来给大家搬运啦~~
这个mod叫苦力怕意识mod!是个很不错的mod！
下面引用一下籽岷的视频：
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XOTM5NDk0Mzky.html

怎么样？还嫌介绍太少？？没问题！看下面：
作者原话：Mobs running of exploding creepers ARE BACK
Secret feature added in 14w11
And removed after
IS BACK


Why is it less laggy?
Instead of each entity scanning around for creepers, here that are creepers that are scanning and telling everybody around "run, i will explode"... See How does this work
How does this work?


Creeper / tnt that is about to explode, searches for each entity in radius=explosionPower*1.5:

Each affected entity finds random safe block away from center and path to it:


MC sends all affected entities to found block with speed=distance/ticksLeftBeforeExplosion:
Each new entity that enters dangerous zone before explosion will be processed...英文渣就不要看了，原话和籽岷都介绍过了，如果看不懂我来告诉你们此mod的作用：这个mod能让各种生物（几乎所有）都能在苦力怕和TNT爆炸之前逃跑！！！还是以神速！！（其实没这么夸张啦！只是逃跑的速度比平时快了很多....金粒吧！！怎么样？？？这mod不错吧！觉得不错的就下载或给人气和（人气加了不会扣自己的...）金粒吧！！下载地址上面看...THE END
